attributes.action: Ban batteries containing lead, zinc, carbon and chloride - substances dangerous to humans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These substances are not only dangerous, but also using them means a waste of resources that could be better used, e.g. lead for ammunition production, carbon for steel production, zinc for galvanisation of steel, and chloride for killing bacteries. Please also ask other governments to ban these batteries, and to sign a global treaty making battery recycling compulsory.
